amount.description: Amount of XRP for sender to set aside in this channel.

destination.description: Address to receive XRP claims against this channel.

settleDelay.description: Amount of seconds the source address must wait before closing the channel if it has unclaimed XRP.

publicKey.description: Public key of the key pair the source may use to sign claims against this channel.

cancelAfter.description: Time when this channel expires. This expiration cannot be changed after creating the channel.
